Navigate Your Digital World Faster with HotPath

Welcome to HotPath, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to revolutionize how you interact with the web. Say goodbye to the endless scrolling through bookmarks and history. HotPath elegantly simplifies your browsing experience, making it faster, more intuitive, and incredibly efficient.

Quick Access to Your Favorite Sites
HotPath intelligently tracks your most visited websites, creating a dynamic list of your top destinations - your 'HotPaths'. With a simple and intuitive interface, you're just a click or a hotkey away (Cmd+Shift+H) from your favorite sites. Whether it's news, social media, work tools, or just your favorite blog, HotPath keeps them at your fingertips.

Effortless Browsing History Navigation
Ever tried to find that one website you visited days ago but can't quite remember the name? HotPath has got you covered. With an easy-to-access list of your last 100 visited sites, retracing your digital steps has never been easier. Dive back into your browsing history with a simple, user-friendly interface that takes the hassle out of searching through your browser history.

Streamlined, User-Friendly Experience
We believe in keeping things simple and efficient. Thatâ€™s why HotPath boasts a clean, clutter-free interface that's a breeze to navigate. Its lightweight design means it won't slow down your browser, giving you a smooth and responsive user experience every time. You never have to leave the page you are currently on.

Secure
Your browsing habits are unique, and HotPath respects that. Nothing is sent over the net- your history belongs to you.
